testsuite.name: Scenario: creation fails with correct username and too short password

testcase.name: Given command new user is selected
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails with correct username and too short password

testcase.name: When a valid username "liisa2" and incorrect password "salatt1" and matching password confirmation are entered
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails with correct username and too short password

testcase.name: Then user is not created and error "password should have at least 8 characters" is reported
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails with correct username and too short password

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails with correct username and too short password

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: creation fails with too short username and valid password ?[90m# ohtu/new_user.feature:8?[0m ?[32mGiven ?[0m?[32mcommand new user is selected?[0m ?[90m# Stepdefs.new_user_selected()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32ma short username "?[0m?[32m?[1mli?[0m?[32m" and password "?[0m?[32m?[1msalainen1?[0m?[32m" and matching password confirmation are entered?[0m ?[90m# Stepdefs.too_short_username_and_matching_passwords_are_given(String,String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32muser is not created and error "?[0m?[32m?[1musername should have at least 3 characters?[0m?[32m" is reported?[0m ?[90m# Stepdefs.user_is_not_created_and_error_message_is_given(String)?[0m
